title: Saudi Arabia introduces new Arabic policy to expand use in schools, courts and tech sector
summary_full: Saudi Arabia has launched a historic National Policy for the Arabic Language, aiming to modernize its use in business, science, and global influence.  The policy, with eight core principles, seeks to reinforce Arabic's status as a pillar of national identity and cultural security, promoting its vibrant presence across all sectors of life.
